bullets: Integrated backend APIs with third party payment system to ensure security and integrity of financial transactions
Developed a responsive frontend for entire payment pipeline using React and Tailwind CSS for stylish design
Analyzed website usage with Google Analytics and maintain site availability
Created image processing flows to label organ segments and perform volume analysis based on ultrasound images
Utilized Unet CNN model with TensorFlow to enhance accuracy of ultrasound image processing
Transferred machine learning model and processing flows to Android with TensorFlow Lite and integrated with portable ultrasound devices to calculate organs volume in real time
